org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl
Class AeBPELMessageDataValidator

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.AeBPELMessageDataValidator
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeMessageValidator
public class AeBPELMessageDataValidator
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeMessageValidator

Subclass of AeMessageDataValidator that validates the message iff the engine config has message validation enabled. Any faults during validation are rethrown as the standard bpel validation fault.

Field Summary
private  boolean mRelaxedValidation
          if true, the validator allows for empty parts or extra parts
